name: Dracomorph
aura: Increases Ally ACC in Faction Crypts by 50.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases by 10% for each debuff on the target. Will attack 1 random enemy with any surplus damage if the target is killed. Damage inflicted is equal to triple the surplus damage. The surplus damage cannot be critical.
skills.name: Seeping Pain
skills.books:

Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 4 times at random. Each hit places a 5% [Poison] debuff for 3 turns.

Level 4: Damage +15%

skills.desc: Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff and a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.
